subtitle: Use low or full fat fromage frais and use seasonal fruits or thawed frozen ones.

method.text: Hull and slice all but 4 strawberries, if using. Put slices into a pan with other fruit and 2 tablespoons of water.
Bring to boil, then stir in redcurrant jelly. When dissolved, leave fruit to cool.
Layer fruit and fromage frais into individual dishes and top with fromage frais.

title: Mixed berry sundaes
